entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 03:30 AM NST Monday 02 January 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -2.6°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
